title: A-Train 9 V4.0 : Japan Rail Simulator
notes: In the config tool, set Textures to "Low" for game to work ("High" does not work in Windows 10 either so not a direct fault of Proton). Ran several hours with anisotropic 16x filter, anti-aliasing on, HDR on high, not see any issues.

title: A-Train 9 V4.0 : Japan Rail Simulator
notes:
Setting textures to high causes the game to run with a black screen and the log is flooded with framebuffer errors
Setting shadow resolution to high makes the game crash
Running the game at 4k will cause the game to only render UI
Anti-aliasing doesn't seem to do anything
Forcing anti-aliasing via the driver causes similar issues to setting texture or shadow resolution
Tried the demo.  No sound; graphics running at ~1FPS.  Utterly unplayable.  Didn't bother trying to troubleshoot.
title: A-Train 9 V4.0 : Japan Rail Simulator

notes: I am asked if I want to play or if I want to start the configuration tool. After selecting one of them and clicking play, nothing happens.
title: A-Train 9 V4.0 : Japan Rail Simulator
